text: My boys look forward to going to school and spend time with their friends/teacher every day. When they come back home, they often talk about what happens in school. The teachers at MLC are patient, dedicated, professional, down to earth, and attentive to details. Their love for the kids give us assurance that our children are well looked after.

A school with good syllabus and caring environment. The school focus on academic and provides a joyful learning. The teachers are very caring, patient,  passionate and dedicated. Most importantly my children enjoy going to school everyday.
Dedicated and passionate teachers who are fully committed to the welfare of the students. Clean environment, convenient location. Within walking distance to bus stops, sheltered car park.
